title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 330.2 - Voting faculty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 330.2 - Voting faculty

State Regulations

The chancellor, the executive and administrative officers
of the university, and the voting faculty of each college as defined in section
334.3
of this Subchapter, shall be
voting members of the university faculty, each of whom shall be entitled to one
vote. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
330.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
